transforms.code:
# Extracting the device name and device description
	device_name = self.view.params.deviceName
	device_description = self.view.custom.deviceDescription
	new_name = device_name.replace("Aerobridge", "AB")
	new_description = device_description.replace("Preconditioned Air Unit", "")
	transformed_value = new_name + new_description
	label = 'Preconditioned Air Unit - ' + transformed_value
	return label

# Check if the tag is true before formatting the date
	tag_path = self.view.custom.deviceTypePath + '/Status/Running'
	tag_value = system.tag.read(tag_path).value  
	if tag_value:
	    value = system.date.format(value, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss")
	    if value == "1970-01-01 10:00:00":
	        value = ""
	else:
	    # If the tag is not true, set the value to blank
	    value = ""
	
	return value

params.tagQuality: Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Temperature.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Service Hose Extended.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Service Hose Stowed.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Service Point Main.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Service Point A.quality' not found.")
Bad_NotFound("Path '[default]International/Precinct/South West/Bay 71/Preconditioning Air Unit A/Status/Service Point B.quality' not found.")

config.expression:
case (tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Description'),

'Kingfisher RTU',
'RTU Name: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Gateway')
+', RTU IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/RTU Status/Status Folder/HostIP')
+', Mode: '+ tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/RTU Status/Status Folder/Status')
,

'GE PLC',
//Aerobridge and GP and PCA signals are from different GE PLCs, so each device should be checked seperately
//check the opc instance
'GE OPC Instance: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTypePath} + '/Parameters.OPC Instance')
//example: to read the IP address based on GE OPC Instance. in this example OPC instance is:AB-GE-BP-ABB10,opc item path to read IP:   nsu=KEPServerEX;s=Channel1.AB-GE-BP-ABB10._System._DeviceId
+ ', GE PLC IP: '+runScript("system.opc.readValue('KEPServerEX/UA@OPSWAMSTST1.ops.aero.int', 'nsu=KEPServerEX;s='+'" +tag({view.custom.deviceTypePath}+ '/Parameters.OPC Instance') + "'+'._System._DeviceId')")
,

'Kingfisher RTU and GE PLC',
//GP and PCA signals are from KF RTU
'RTU Name: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.Gateway')
+', RTU IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/RTU Status/Status Folder/HostIP')
+', Mode: '+tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/RTU Status/Status Folder/Status')
,

'Siemens PLC',
//
'Siemens OPC Name: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.OPC Name')
+', PLC IP: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.IP Address')
+', PLC Mode: '+ tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/AMS Panel/PLC Status/Status Folder/Mode Desc')
+', Moxa Gateway IP: ' + tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/Ground Power Unit A/Input Meter/Hostname')
,

'Moxa-Siemens PLC',
//used in Bay 71 to 73
'PLC: NOT used'
+', Moxa Gateway Name: ' + tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.ModbusGateway')
+', Moxa Gateway IP: ' + tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/Ground Power Unit A/Input Meter/Hostname')
,

'Moxa-GE PLC',
//used in Bay 74 to 77
'PLC: NOT used'
+', Moxa Gateway Name: ' + tag({view.custom.deviceTagPath} + '/Parameters.ModbusGateway')
+', Moxa Gateway IP: ' + tag ({view.custom.deviceTagPath}+'/Ground Power Unit A/Input Meter/Hostname')
,

'error in UDT: /Parameters.Description')
